description.en:
In Gangshik Choi's world, monster attacks are a common occurrence. Humanity is protected by hunters with superpowers who stream their fights online, and it is Gangshik's job to get it all on camera as the cameraman for a below-average monster streamer. In a stream gone wrong, he suddenly finds himself in front of the camera... but human viewers aren't the only ones watching him. Now, he is a streamer for the Gods, and more viewers mean more power. With monsters at every turn, how long can Gangshik keep the cameras rolling?
(Source: Tapas Media)
description.ko:
'몬스터'라는 존재가 등장하여 인류를 위협하는 사회.

 아무런 예고 없이 등장한 이질적인 존재에 의해  
 주인공 최강식의 가족은 목숨을 잃게 된다.

 가족의 복수를 꿈꾸며 살아가지만, 초능력에 적성이 없는 최강식.  
 그런 그의 눈앞에 뜬 이질적인 문구.
 
 '어떤 신이 인사합니다.' [시청자 1]
 
 그건 바로 신의 여흥을 위한 스트리머로 선정된 것!
 '시청'하는 신들의 숫자가 늘수록 새로운 능력과 아이템을 얻게 된다는 사실. 
 이제 주인공은 목숨을 건 방송을 시작하게 된다. 

 오로지 가족의 복수를 위해서...

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4-%ED%97%8C%ED%84%B0-%EC%8B%A4%ED%99%94%EB%83%90/2833)

altTitles.ja: 忘れえぬ魔女の物語

description.en:
Even if today disappears, these feelings will not.
An everyday in which nothing happens, with each day slightly different than the last.
The slightly strange story of her, and me, and our clumsy feelings.

Only I remember that there were three entrance ceremonies this year. Only I remember the unchosen days. The world, repeating 'todays' like a broken record...

"My name is Inaba Michiru. Nice to meet you."

A story about her, who befriended me the following day as well. About my first human relationship, about the gradually shrinking distance between us, and my quietly changing feelings...

A slightly strange story about a friendless, loveless me, and her, and our clumsy feelings.

When a goddess transports Hansoo Kang and his classmates to a magical fantasy world to become heroes, it’s like a dream come true. But when Hansoo declines to risk his life for a world that isn’t his own, the goddess leaves him for dead, alone in the forest.

That’s when he realizes she’s not what she seems. With the help of a loner god, Hansoo faces the hostile new world and earns powerful blessings to help him survive. But his goal isn’t to save the world; it’s to return home… well, after he gets revenge on the goddess, that is.
description.ko:
지금까지 이런 용사는 없었다.
이것은 용사인가 악마인가.

같은 반 아이들과 이세계로 소환된 강한수.
반 친구들은 마법이니 이세계니 신기해 하지만,
한수는 얼른 집에 돌아가고 싶을 뿐이다.
안락하고 따뜻한 우리 집을 냅두고 왜 이세계에서 모험같은 걸...?

소환한 여신도 정 의지가 없다면 어쩔 수 없다며 본래 세계로 돌려보내주겠다고 약속하고
한수를 집으로 보내주지만...

눈을 떠보니 이세계 그대로!
친구들은 없어졌고 주위에는 몬스터 뿐이다!!

여신이 날 속였어...?
집에는 어떻게 돌아가지...??
그보다 여기서는 어떻게 살아남지...???

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4-%EC%9A%A9%EC%82%AC-%EC%8B%A4%ED%99%94%EB%83%90/2821)
description.uk:
Такого героя ще не було!
Він герой, чи справжній демон?

Кан Хансу був призваний у цей світ разом зі своїми однокласниками.
Його однокласники були вражені цим абсолютно новим світом і магією в ньому, але єдине, чого хотів Хансу, — це швидко повернутися додому.

"Навіщо мені відмовлятися від свого теплого, затишного дому, щоб отримати пригоду в цьому світі…?

Навіть богиня, яка викликала мене, сказала, що якщо я не хочу, вона не буде змушувати мене, і пообіцяла повернути мене в мій початковий світ.
Вона телепортувала мене, але…

Коли я відкрив очі, я досі був у цьому світі!
Усі мої друзі зникли, а навколо мене були лише монстри!!

Якась богиня обдурила мене...?
Як мені тепер повернутися додому...?
Більше того, як мені тут вижити...?!"

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en:
Kazama Kenji likes to believe he is something of a delinquent. Moreover, others seem to like to agree that he is. Of course, Kenji's gang finds their way to a group of four not-so-normal girls - Chitose, Sakura, Minami and Roka - and all at once, whatever reputation he may have, is nothing compared to the outrageous behavior of the girls. Shanghaied into joining their club, what will happen to his everyday life from that point on?  


---
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15705)
description.ru: Печально известный главарь банды Казама Кенжи наталкивается на группу странных девчонок, воображающих, что они владеют магией стихий. В итоге девчонки шантажируют его, чтобы он вступил в их клуб. Итак, приключения начинаются…

description.en:
Dante Renatus, who had even claimed the throne as the Empress Regent with her excellent swordsmanship, is reincarnated as 'Helena', the daughter of the Duke of Peresca 500 years later. A second life she hadn't wanted. She had already enjoyed everything in her previous life, and had tried everything she had wanted to try. If she has to be reborn, it's just annoying and boring no matter what she does. In the meantime, Prince Caesar visits the duchy to avoid a power struggle, and Helena, who recognizes Caesar's talent, decides to become his swordsmanship teacher.

"I'll make you an Emperor."

It was just something I started thinking about, using the skills of my previous life to train future students and liven up my boring life. But even if you like me, don't you think you like me a bit too much?

---
Dante Lenatous, who'd become the Empress Regent in her past life. Five hundred years later, she's reborn as the youngest daughter of a duchy?

I have already achieved everything I wanted in my past life and done everything I'd wanted, so no matter what I do in this unwanted second round of life, it's annoying and boring.

Since I was reborn anyway, I'd been thinking of teaching young students, but... my disciples love me too much. Was I this talented at teaching?

"If it's for you, Teacher, I can even lead this world to ruin!"

All I'd done was discovered Prince Caesar's talent, so why is he acting like that?!

The teaching of young students by the Max-Level Princess who has no regrets or lingering feelings towards life--!

---
I was an illegitimate daughter abandoned by the promiscuous emperor. From there, I ended up on the street where I learned that I had a knack for the sword. I competed in tournaments, became a mercenary, and I made a name for myself. Just when I had become the talk of the empire, the emperor wanted me back. In return, I demanded to be next in line for the throne. After years of hard work, I finally became empress and died happily. But here I am, alive again. Ugh, can’t a girl be left alone? This time, I’m going to be as lazy as I please!

---

description.fr:
Dante Renatus, qui a pris la place d'empereur grâce à son excellente maîtrise de l' épée s'est réincarné 500 ans plus tard sous le nom d'Helena, la fille du duc de Pereska.

«Je ne voulais pas de cette seconde vie.»

Dante– Helena ne fait que répéter ses actions et ses expériences passées et trouve pour cela les réincarnations ennuyantes et sans intérêts mais lorsque César, le prince, visite la résidence du duc pour échapper à la lutte pour le pouvoir elle lui trouve un talent particulier et décide de devenir son professeur d'épée.

description.hu:
A Max Level hercegnő ma is unatkozik, mint Dante Renatus, aki korábbi életében császár volt. Ötszáz évvel később egy hercegség legfiatalabb lányaként születik újjá? Már mindent elértem, amit szerettem volna az előző életemben, és mindent megtettem, amit akartam, szóval nem számít, mit csinálok életemnek ebben a nem kívánt második körében. Ez bosszantó és unalmas. Amúgy újjászületésem óta arra gondoltam, hogy fiatal diákokat tanítok, de... a tanítványaim túlságosan szeretnek. Ilyen tehetséges voltam a tanításban? – Ha érted, tanár úr, akár tönkretehetem ezt a világot! Csak annyit tettem, hogy felismertem Caesar herceg tehetségét, akkor miért viselkedsz így? Fiatal diákok tanítása a Max Level hercegnőtől, aki nem bánja meg az életet, és nem is marad el az élet iránti érzelme...!

---
Egy törvénytelen lány voltam, akit elhagyott a császár. Onnan az utcára kerültem, ahol megtudtam, hogy értek a kardforgatáshoz. Versenyekre indultam, zsoldos lettem, és nevet szereztem magamnak. Amikor már a birodalomban rólam beszéltek, a császár visszahívott. Cserébe követeltem, hogy én lehessek a következő a trónörökös. Több év kemény munka után végül császárnő lettem, és boldogan haltam meg. De most itt vagyok, újra élek. Ugh, nem lehet egy lányt békén hagyni? Ezúttal olyan lusta leszek, amennyire csak lehet!

---

description.ko:
전생에 무려 황제까지 찍었던 단테 레나투스.
500년 후, 공작가의 막내딸로 환생하다?!

원하지 않던 2회차 인생, 전생에서 누릴 거 다 누렸고,
해 볼 거 다 해봤으니 현생에서 뭘 해도 귀찮고 무료할 뿐이다.

기왕 태어난 거 후학 양성이나 해 볼까 하는데,
……제자들이 날 너무 사랑한다.
내 교육자적 재능이 이렇게 훌륭했던가?

“스승님을 위해서라면, 이 세계도 멸망시킬 수 있어!”

황자 카이사르의 재능을 알아 봤을 뿐인데
왜 그런 방향으로 튀는 거야?!

생의 후회도 미련도 없는 만렙 공녀님의
인생 2회차 후학 양성기―!

description.ru:
Данте Ренатус, которая с помощью своих выдающихся навыков владения мечом заняла даже место императора, перерождается спустя 500 лет как «Хелена», дочь герцога Ферески.2-я жизнь, которой она не желала.В прошлой жизни она насладилась всем, чем хотела, и попробовала всё, что только могла попробовать.После перерождения, что бы она ни делала, любая вещь ей быстро надоедала и казалась скучной.Однако в тот момент ради решения вопроса о власти в герцогство приезжает принц Кайсар. Хелена, рассмотревшая в нём талант, решила стать его учителем фехтования.«Я сделаю тебя императором».Всё это началось из-за желания разукрасить свою жизнь с помощью попыток взрастить подопечного...«Ради мастера я уничтожу весь этот мир».Но отчего-то мне кажется, что я не просто понравилась своему ученику, а прямо запала в его душу.

---

description.uk:
Данте Ренатус, котра в минулому житті посіла почесне місце імператриці завдяки своїй майстерності фехтування, через 500 років переродилась «Хеленою» - донькою герцога Перески.

«Навіщо мені друге життя? Я насолоджувалась тими благами, які мала у попередньому, і спробувала все, чого тільки бажала моя душа. Все те, чим я займаюсь зараз здається мені неймовірно нудним.»

Та в той момент її резиденцію відвідує принц Цезар, задля уникнення боротьби за владу. Герцогиня визнала його талант, приймаючи рішення стати його вчителькою фехтування.

«Я зроблю тебе імператором.»

Це було лише спробою урізноманітнити її марудне життя. Герцогиня мала намір використати навички її минулого життя задля виховання учнів.

«Заради вас, наставнице, я можу знищити весь світ.»

«Щось мені підказує, що я надто сильно подобаюсь своєму учневі.»

---

altTitles.ja: ぼっち転生記

description.en:
I don't trust any human being.  
  
An unemployed, virgin 29-years-old Loner man who has a very deep distrust toward humans was trying to save a woman who was almost raped. He is stabbed in the chest by the assaulter and left to die alone while cursing the humans. When he came to, he realized that he had reincarnated in another world as the second son of a lower noble family where magic and spirit exist as a human baby named Ash Hawkwood.  
  
Without talent for [True Magic] or [Swordmanship] this the story about how he build his own empire from scratch by using his own power.

description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

description.en:
In order to trace the culprit behind his family’s murder in his childhood, Vampire Hunter Heilo accepts a kill order from a client. 

His target is the head of the Livera Group, Herrace. Heilo joins Herrace’s company, and successfully acquires a position as the personal secretary of Herrace himself, who is known for his dominating presence in politics and the underworld. 

However, Herrace’s special treatment gradually causes Heilo’s heart to sway… 

What will his fate be, having fallen for the man he's supposed to kill?!
description.fr:
Le chasseur de vampires Heilo effectue une mission d'assassinat pour un client afin de trouver des indices qui pourraient le conduire à la personne qui a assassiné sa famille lorsqu'il était enfant. La cible à laquelle Heilo doit faire face est le chef du groupe Rivera, Hereis. Pendant son infiltration, Heilo a rejoint la société d'Hereis, connue pour être un gros bonnet dans le monde politique et ses coulisses. Il réussit ensuite à devenir son secrétaire exécutif. Cependant, le traitement spécial d'Hereis ne cesse d'ébranler les convictions d'Heilo...

Quel sera le destin d'Heilo s'il tombe amoureux d'un homme qu'il doit tuer !

En co-prod avec la Boulangerie

description.en:
As children, Billy promised Kirika, an oni girl, that he would always protect her even after they got older. Ten years have passed since that promise and it looks like the roles have reversed?

description.en: A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

An accident forced two handsome schoolboys who originally disliked each other to bind together in a love game. Chi Che became a game player, while Cen Huang’s soul left his body to become a game system. In order to return back to normal, both player and system can only brace themselves and complete the rest of the game’s strategy missions. What’s outrageous is that the attack target is unexpectedly Cen Huang’s soulless body?! Thus, a straight guy helping another straight guy pursue his own dramatic love game has now begun…

A dangerous control freak senior who refuses to socialize x an optimistic talkative junior who lacks love.

description.en:
After a catastrophe wipes out civilization, leaving only mysterious towers as humanity’s last refuge, those who are able to reach the higher levels are revered as “Astras.” Baek Homin is just a low-level lackey, but all that changes when he is tattooed with a skill-inducing circuit. Now, he has the power to recall the memories of his past incarnations… all three of whom happen to be Astras! As Homin sets out on a new adventure full of formidable foes, will the Astras be able to keep him safe?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%84%B1%EC%A2%8C%EB%93%A4%EC%9D%B4-%EB%82%98%EB%A7%8C-%EC%A2%8B%EC%95%84%ED%95%B4/2518)

description.fr: Un évènement inconnu plongea le monde dans l'obscurité et provoqua l'apparition de tours aux quatre coins du monde. Dès lors, l'humanité n'eut qu’un seul but : atteindre le sommet des tours. Arrivé au 89e étage, Baek Ho-min, un guerrier de talent, meurt, terrassé par un serpent géant. À sa mort, il rencontre deux individus, qui ne sont autres que ses vies passées ! Dépités d’avoir une fois encore échoués à rejoindre le sommet, ils jurent que leur prochaine vie sera la bonne !
description.ko:
미스테리한 탑이 생겨나면서 세상이 멸망했다.
탑은 오로지 자신의 주위에만 빛을 내려 인간들의
유일한 터전이 되어 주었다.
이에 인간들은 탑의 정상에 모든 비밀이 있을거란 믿음으로
탑을 오르기 시작했다.
그 과정에서 인간을 초월한 성과를 이룬 자들은
탑의 정상에 별자리로 새겨지며 '성좌'라는 칭호를 얻게 되었는데
회귀를 반복하던 백호민은 비밀스런 성좌들의
도움을 받으며 탑을 오르게 된다.

description.en:
For generations the Torqye Pashalu and the Balt-Rhein Empire have stood in stern opposition of each other. Then one night, when an Imperial minister is found assassinated, the two nations are plunged into a potentially explosive situation. As the generals of Torqye's council cry for war, Mahmut comes to discover the devious truth behind the assassination. Thus the young pasha's battle for his country and peace and trust in his fellow man begins…  

---

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

description.en:
Known as “Pet Shop,” Mr. Kim has the unique ability to absorb the skills of the creatures he eats. One day, Pet Shop is mysteriously transported to a magical world full of orcs, trolls, and monsters. A new world, new chow, and new skills. Now Pet Shop is determined to become the most powerful creature in the world. Follow his epic climb to the top of the food chain.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30674)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/appetit-feroce)
description.fr:
Les armes à feu du monde humain pouvaient arrêter notre héros, plus rien ne peut l’arrêter dans ce nouvel univers ! Réincarné dans une époque imaginaire, celui qu’on surnomme « L’animalerie » doit manger des animaux pour obtenir leurs aptitudes. Pour devenir plus fort, il doit allier quantité et qualité. Sa vie ressemble à un jeu vidéo où il faut gagner des compétences et il connaît les règles par cœur !

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30674)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/appetit-feroce)
description.ko:
사람은 누구나 자신만의 재능을 가지고 있다. 그리고 그가 가진 재능은 바로 '먹는 것'이었다. 세계 곳곳을 돌아다니던 한국 출신의 국제범죄자 킴. 각종 범죄를 저지르던 킴은 국제경찰에 붙잡혀 호송되던 중 알 수 없는 세계에 빨려 들어간다. 그 세계에는 몬스터라 불리는 존재들이 가득했고, 그곳에서 킴은 모든 것을 먹어 치우며 최강의 생물을 꿈꾸게 된다. 나는 무엇이든 먹어 치울 것이다. 설령 그것이 드래곤이라 해도, 마왕이라 해도, 신이라 해도! 그리고 나는... 먹을수록 강해진다. <먹을수록 강해짐>

---

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/appetit-feroce)
description.ru:
«У каждого есть талант. Мой талант — есть».
Ким, международный преступник из Кореи, который скитался по миру и совершивший различные преступления, был пойман международной полицией и затянут в неизвестный мир.

description.zh:
每个人都有自己专属的才能，李先生拥有的技能便是“吃”！捕猎经历丰富，在世界各地逃亡的的李被国际警察抓捕归案，护送途中掉入了一个未知的世界。这个世界充满了各种怪物。在这里，李吃掉各种生物，梦想成为这个世界的最强者。“我将吃掉所有东西，无论它是龙，是魔王，还是神！而我，越吃越强！”

description.en:
A former cop was murdered on a snowy Christmas Eve night. The suspect was arrested & the case appeared to be closed.

However, a letter left by the murdered former cop to his daughter sets the case back on track. It said, "If any of the following persons are arrested or prosecuted...they are falsely accused." And on that list was the name of the suspect who was arrested for killing her father...

altTitles.ja: ケイヤクシマイ

description.en:
Kasane Hayafuji's secret joy in life is seeing Aoyama-san, a waitress at a family restaurant. One night, she saw Aoyama standing alone in the rain. When she tried to help, Aoyama suddenly made her an offer.

"Will you be my big sister?"

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59079)
description.id:
Menemui Aoyama-san yang bekerja sebagai pelayan di restoran keluarga merupakan arti kehidupan Hayafuji Kasane. Pada suatu hari, Kasane memutuskan membantu Aoyama-san yang tengah berdiam diri di tengah guyuran hujan. Kemudian, Aoyama-san tiba-tiba menawari Kasane perjanjian saudari.

“Bersediakah kamu… menjadi kakakku?”

altTitles.en: I'm the Only One with a Failure of a Skill in Another World's Summoning Rebellion: Until the Weakest Skill [Absorption] Swallows Everything

description.en: The student Nakatani Yuto was supposed to be having a regular life, however his whole class was transferred to another world. All the students gained powerful skills and were worshipped as heroes, but for Yuto who got the unfavorable skill [Absorption]...! ?
description.ja: 高校生の中谷夕斗は突然クラスメイトと共に異世界へ「勇者」として召喚されてしまう。クラスメイト達が強力な技能（スキル）を授かるなか、ユウトが授かったのは不遇スキル【吸】であった。 使い物にならないユウトは魔物との戦闘で致命傷を負うが、クラスメイトは彼を見殺しに…。その瞬間、ユウトにはどこからともなく“声”が聞こえて――…!?

altTitles.ja: ナインピークス

description.en:
A heartwarming tale of a father and son's bond.

After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him.

Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water...

When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
description.ru: Душещипательная история о взаимоотношениях отца и сына. Главный герой — Масио Гаку, не особо ладит со своим отцом. После ссоры с сыном, Масио Харуми умирает... Гаку даже подумать не мог, что с его отцом, не особо общительным человеком, придёт проститься так много людей. Вскоре Гаку решает пойти на рыбалку где по случайности падает в море, но сразу же выбирается с помощью какого-то странного человека... Этим незнакомцем оказался его отец, ровно в 2000 году! Теперь Гаку начинает помогать Харуми, своему отцу, добиться статуса лидера города и разобраться что же здесь происходит...
description.vi: Sau cái chết của cha, Mashio Gaku biết được một sự thật động trời: Cha cậu từng là gã du côn mạnh nhất thành phố. Thế rồi một biến cố bất ngờ xảy ra, đưa cậu trở về quá khứ 22 năm trước, khi cha cậu bằng tuổi cậu...

Kyou kara Hajimeru Osananajimi

description.en:
“Will you be my childhood friend?”

Kaede always wished for a childhood friend like in the manga she reads. When she moved next door to her classmate, Kouhei, he said he’d do anything to help her out. So, she asked him to be her childhood friend! 

The two of them have fun adventures recreating all of the things that childhood friends should do!
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)

title.en: My Three Thousand Years To The Sky

altTitles.es-la: Mis 3000 Años Hacia el Reino Celestial

description.en:
At the age of seventeen, Bai already reached level ten of the Qi Refining stage, just about to breakthrough. What a genius!

Three thousand years later, Bai has already reached level 66,66a of Qi Refining… yet… there’s still no sign of breaking through at all. From Grandmaster to “Grand-Monster”, he can still be a bad*ss even when stuck on the newbie stage for three thousand years!

---
- [Alt Raw Bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc27306)
description.ko:
명성 높은 수련종파인 청명검종. 그리고 그 청명검종의 전설과도 같은 인물인 백추연.
백추연은 타고난 자질로 인해 수많은 이들의 큰 기대를 받으며 성장했지만, 어느 순간 벽에 부딪쳐 연기기 경지에서 정체되고 만다.
하지만 언제고 연기기를 뛰어넘을 터. 사부와 사형, 사문의 기대 속에서 백추연은 계속해 수련에 매진하게 된다.
그리고 삼천년.
백추연은 연기기 육만육천육백육십사장의 경지에 이르렀지만, 아직도 연기기의 굴레어서 벗어나지 못하고 있다.
description.zh: 《炼气练了三千年》小说改编作品。 三千年前，天资绝顶的白秋然被青冥剑宗创始人，青冥道人收为门徒，开始修仙之路。 三千年后，白秋然的师尊青冥道人飞升成仙，大师兄渡劫失败身死道消，就连最小的小师妹的六世孙都筑基成功，学会了御剑乘风而行。 而经历三千年的苦修，白秋然他，终于达到了炼气期第六万六千六百六十四层的境界。

altTitles.ja: セブンス

description.en:
Lyle Walt is a young noble boy and heir looking forward to the day he can inherit his family’s territory. Except around when he was 10 year old, his parents started neglecting him more and more in favour of his little sister, Ceres.

On his fifteenth birthday, he is challenged to a duel by his sister to see who will inherit the household and horribly loses, being cast out of his family. Afterwards, he gets treated by the family groundskeepers and receives the family heirloom Gem from him that Lyle’s grandfather had entrusted to him. From there, he begins an aimless journey with his childhood friend and former fiancée, Novem, and the Gem-turned-Jewel that houses the memories, personalities, and Skills of seven of his ancestors.

altTitles.en: The Old Knight in the Border - Bard Loen

altTitles.ru: Старый рыцарь из приграничных земель - Бард Лоен

altTitles.ja: 辺境の老騎士 バルド・ローエン

altTitles.en: The Old Knight of a Frontier District - Bard Loen

description.en: Abandoning money, fame and honor, the knight Bard embarks on a journey to find his final resting place. Tasting delicious food, admiring the unfamiliar scenery all by himself, his journey to find a place to die quietly begins. What he doesn't know however, is that this is the beginning of a new adventure for him.
description.ru: Отказавшись от золота и славы, рыцарь Бард пускается в путь, чтобы найти свою смерть. В одиночестве наслаждаясь вкусной едой и видами незнакомых земель, он неспешно идёт вперёд, к своему последнему пристанищу.Однако он ещё не знает, что это лишь начало его великого путешествия, о котором будет говорить не одно поколение.

altTitles.ja: 性食鬼

description.en: Nogawa Izumi is a good student, and a class representative, but she has an increasingly high libido. It's gotten to the point that she'll claim to feel bad during class, so she can run to the nurse's office and masturbate. When she learns that the Earth is being invaded by aliens that look like people dressed up as animals, it turns out her high sex drive may be able to help protect the Earth. The first time Izumi is attacked by the aliens, she is rescued by Usayama, a bunny alien whose race was their previous victim. Usayama gives her an outfit (a sexy swimsuit) that will allow her to fight the aliens, but which also sends her constant arousal through the roof. The scientific organization that Usayama is affiliated with think that Izumi, with her high erotic level, may be the person they've been looking for to fight the aliens. Will Izumi be able to save the Earth?

altTitles.ja: スパイ ファミリー

description.ar: أمضى الجاسوس الخبير المسمى <الشفق> أيامه في مهام سرية ، وكل ذلك من أجل تحقيق عالم أفضل. لكن في يوم من الأيام ، حصل على أمر جديد صعب للغاية من القيادة. من أجل مهمته ، يجب عليه تكوين أسرة مؤقتة وبدء حياة جديدة؟!
description.en:
The master spy codenamed <Twilight> has spent most of his life on undercover missions, all for the dream of a better world. Yet one day he receives a particularly difficult order from command. For his mission, he must form a temporary family and start a new life?! 

A Spy/Action/Comedy manga about a one-of-a-kind family!
description.es: El hábil espía Tasogare se dedicaba diariamente a cumplir misiones especiales por un mundo mejor. Un día recibe un complicado desafío... Su deber es crear una familia falsa y comenzar una nueva vida para poder cumplir la misión, ¿¡pero...!? ¡¡Un Espía × Acción × Comedia de una familia peculiarl!!
description.id: “Twilight,” seorang mata-mata yang hebat, setiap hari menjalankan misi rahasia untuk menciptakan dunia yang lebih baik. Suatu hari, dia mendapatkan perintah baru yang sangat sulit. Demi misi itu, dia harus memiliki keluarga sementara dan memulai hidup baru sebagai seorang ayah! Mata-mata x Aksi x Komedi keluarga istimewa!
description.it: Twilight, una delle migliori spie al mondo, ha trascorso la vita ad affrontare missioni sotto copertura per rendere il mondo un posto migliore. Un giorno però riceve un compito particolarmente difficile: dovrà formare una famiglia temporanea e iniziare una nuova vita!
description.kk: Мастер тыңшының кодтық аты<Twilight> өмірін жақсырақ әлем туралы арман үшін жасырын миссияларда өткізді. Бірақ бір күні ол командадан ерекше қиын жаңа бұйрық алады. Миссиясы үшін ол уақытша отбасын құрып, жаңа өмір бастауы керек пе?! Бірегей отбасы туралы тыңшылық/экшн/комедия!
description.pl:
Wyśmienity szpieg, Zmierzch, poświęcił się wykonywaniu tajnych misji z powodu marzeń o lepszym świecie. Ale pewnego dnia otrzymuje bardzo trudne do wykonania zadanie. Aby osiągnąć cel misji, musi założyć tymczasową rodzinę i prowadzić życie najzwyczajniejszego w świecie ojca!  
Oto opowieść o jedynej w swoim rodzaju rodzinie!
description.ru:
Мастерский шпион с кодовым именем <Сумрак> проводит свои дни в закулисных миссиях, всё ради мечты о лучшем мире. Но однажды он получает особенно сложное новое указание от командования. Для этой миссии он обязательно должен завести фиктивную семью и начать новую жизнь! Шпионская экшен-комедия об единственной в своём роде семье!

---
Хитроумный шпион по прозвищу «Сумрак» изо дня в день выполнял секретные миссии, чтобы сделать мир лучше. Однажды он получил очередное трудное задание — ради миссии ему предстоит… обзавестись временной семьёй и начать новую жизнь?! Вас ждёт яркая смесь из шпионского боевика и необычной семейной комедии!
description.th: สุดยอดสปาย "สนธยา" ได้ปฏิบัติการสอดแนมทุกๆวันเพื่อโลกที่ดีกว่า แต่แล้ววันนึงเขาก็ได้รับภารกิจสุดหิน... เพื่อการนั้นเขาจึงได้สร้างครอบครัวปลอมๆและเริ่มชีวิตใหม่!? สปาย x แอคชั่น x คอเมดี้ครอบครัวสุดแนว!
description.uk:
Холоднокровний і геніальний шпигун з кодовим ім'ям «Сутінь» завжди виконував свою роботу чітко і без зайвого шуму. Свою професію він обрав, плекаючи мрії про кращий світ. Він звик до надзвичайно складних завдань, важливість яких мала найвищий рівень, виконуючи які, він наражав своє життя на небезпеку. Але цього разу… Йому була надіслана інформація про нову місію, для успішного виконання якої «Сутінь» повинен завести сім'ю та вдавати відповідального та люблячого батька на ім'я Лоід Фолджер. Так він «удочирив» дівчинку на ім'я Аня. Дівчинка відразу входить у роль «дочки» і радіє кожній миті, яку проводить з новим «батьком». Тепер є тато та донька, але, як же мама? Нею стане неповторна наймана вбивця на ім'я Юрі Бріар (позивний - "Принцеса шипів"). 
Манґа розкриє всі тонкощі та незвичайний життєвий шлях нової «сім'ї», в якій кожен легко може виконати найскладніше завдання, або усунути ціль, але чи зможуть вони виконувати ролі «мами», «тата» та «доньки»?
description.pt-br:
O brilhante espião "Twilight" se dedicava diariamente a cumprir missões secretas por um mundo melhor. Porém, um dia, ele recebeu uma nova tarefa bastante complicada... Para cumprir a sua missão, ele deve formar uma família temporária e começar uma nova vida, mas...?! Uma história de Espiões × Ação × Comédia de uma família bem peculiar!

[ 1° TEMP.(parte 1 e 2) DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 38. ]
description.zh-hk: 技藝高超的間諜<黃昏>，為了更加美好的世界,每天從事著諜報任務。有一天，司令下達了新的難題——…。為了完成任務，所臨時組建的家庭，所展開的新生活，但是！？間諜×打鬥×與眾不同的家族喜劇現在開始！！

description.fr:
Min-chan, doit vivre sa vie en chassant des fantômes à cause de la malédiction dont il souffre depuis l'enfance. Un jour, il se voit proposer un "gros coup" par un homme puissant en qui lui a autant confiance qu'en sa famille. S'il parvient à se débarrasser de "lui" il pourra mener une vie normale ! Après être arrivé à l'endroit où "il" se trouve, Min-chan rencontre un homme qui l'appelle "Kim Seo-ho".

"Tu es enfin de retour, Kim Seo-ho... !!! Je vais faire en sorte que tu ne puisses plus t'enfuir. Parce que je me souviens de chaque odeur qui te concerne."

Min-chan sera-t-il capable de chasser cet homme en toute sécurité ?"

The adventures of Marciel and his dragons continues. In Koryuu Monogatari, the baby dragons have grown up a little.

description.en: After confessing to my beloved Hanazono-san, I was rejected with the reason, 'I already have an engagement arranged by my parents.' That person is the wealthy and handsome Ikegai-kun, who also happens to have a good personality. Thinking that I had no chance in a straightforward competition, I, Hachiya, decided to cross-dress as a maid and work at the Ikegai house. My plan is to make Ikegai-kun fall for me and break their engagement... Thus begins a slightly silly, cross-dressing maid's comedy that leads to a chaotic love triangle (?)
description.ja: 愛する花園さんに告白するが、「親が決めた婚約者がいるから」とフラれてしまった。相手はお金持ちでイケメンでおまけに性格もいい池貝くん。フツーに戦っても、俺の勝ち目はゼロと考えた蜂谷は女装して池貝家のメイドになり、池貝くんをホレさせて婚約を破談させようと考えて…ちょっぴりおバカな男の娘メイドが引き起こす、ドタバタ三角関係（？) コメディ！

description.fr:
Ce webtoon contient des scènes de violence graphique, des meurtres d'animaux et d'autres éléments perturbants.

Calahan est un célèbre chasseur de prime qui a capturé 999 criminels recherchés.
Il choisit l'escroc Johnny Downs comme dernière cible pour la récompense de 10 millions de pièces et sa retraite.
Mais Johnny, qui est accusé d'avoir fait les poches de personnes âgées, clame son innocence.

"Si je vous prouve mon innocence, donnez-moi un million de pièces".

Calahan et Johnny se lancent dans une course effrénée avec un million de pièces à la clé,
avec un groupe d'hommes suspects à leurs trousses...

À dix jours du bureau du shérif, qui gagnera le pari ?

altTitles.ja: 7人の眠り姫

description.en: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?
description.fr: Un prince errant est parti pour briser une ancienne malédiction qui ensorcelle le royaume d'Amaryllis en réveillant sa princesse par un baiser d'amour véritable. Cependant, personne ne lui a dit qu'il y avait 7 princesses à embrasser et il doit maintenant prendre ses responsabilités en vivant avec elles pendant qu'ils découvrent pourquoi les habitants d'Amaryllis sont incapables de se réveiller. Parviendront-ils à être heureux pour toujours ?

description.en: Yilin bumps into the tomboy Rouxi, sparking an interest between each other that slowly blooms.
description.pt-br: Yilin esbarra na tomboy Rouxi, despertando um interesse entre elas que floresce lentamente.

title.en: The Life of a Returning Officer

description.en:
Choi Jong-hyuk, captain of the intellectual crime unit, loses his mother and his own life to a mysterious mastermind for digging too deeply into a case. In his last moments, Jong-hyuk catches a glimpse of the man who kills him before waking up as his 17-year-old self.

 To prevent his mother's death, Jong-hyuk swears to hunt down the one responsible. Luckily, he has knowledge about the future and his experience as an officer.

Will these tools be enough to catch the criminal that eluded him once?
description.id: Cerita tentang Choi Jong-hyuk, ketua tim intelejen investigasi kejahatan, ketika dia ingin menemui jenazah ibunya, ia mengalami kecelakaan misterius lalu entah bagaimana dia kembali ke tahun tahun 1997.

description.en: A close and dangerous cohabitation with the cult leader's son has begun! Chungah was swindled by her uncle who she trusted and her parents disappeared, saying they are chasing their missing uncle, and Chungah suddenly lives alone in an empty house. But it wasn't just Chungah's family that was scammed! The biggest cult in the autonomous district, "Millennium Adventist Church," was also deceived by her uncle. And "Yohan," the son of the cult leader came to Chung-ah's house. He's dragging his luggage in...! God, is this cohabitation gonna be okay?
description.uk: Інтимне та небезпечне співмешкання з сином лідера культу почалось! Чону обманув її дядько, якому вона довіряла і її батьки пропали, коли сказали, що шукатимуть його, і раптом Чона живе одна в пустому будинку. Але обманули не тільки сім‘ю Чони! Найбільший культ в автономному районі «тисячолітня адвентистська церква» була теж обдурена її дядьком. І «Йохан», син лідера культу, прийшов до Чони додому. Він заносить свої речі…! Боже, що ж буде з цим співжиттям?
description.pt-br: Uma vida próxima e perigosa do filho do líder de um culto começou! Chungah foi enganada por seu tio em quem confiava e seus pais desapareceram, dizendo que estavam perseguindo seu tio desaparecido, e Chungah de repente vive sozinha em uma casa vazia. Mas não foi só a família de Chungah que foi enganada! O maior culto do distrito autônomo, "Igreja Adventista do Milênio", também foi enganado por seu tio. E "Yohan", o filho do líder do culto, veio à casa de Chung-ah. Ele está arrastando sua mala para dentro...! Deus, será que esta coabitação vai ficar bem?

altTitles.ja: ディアーアネモネ

description.en: When Gaku lands on the Galapagos Islands, a paradise is the last thing he'll be experiencing. With creatures undergoing horrific evolutions, only one rule still stands--the survival of the fittest!
description.fr: Gaku Hachiue et un groupe d'investigation débarquent sur les "îles Galapagos", réputées être un paradis pour les plantes et les animaux. Mais à la place, ils rencontrent des créatures qui ont évolué d'une manière qui leur est propre. Les seuls à pouvoir survivre dans une situation où la vie est brutalement piétinée, et à la loi du plus fort, sont ceux capable d'évoluer à travers des changements répétés.

title.en: Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House

altTitles.ja: 舞妓さんちのまかないさん

altTitles.en: The Caterer at the Maiko Manor
The Makanai: Cooking for the Maiko House

description.en:
Within the winding streets of Kyoto's geisha district lives a 16 year old girl named Kiyo. 
After failing to become a Maiko, a traditional dance apprentice, she starts working as caterer for her troupe. 
This is the story of her daily life.  

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Juru Masak Para Maiko**.

Anime: [AniDB](https://anidb.net/anime/15476) | [MAL](https://myanimelist.net/anime/41556/Maiko-san_Chi_no_Makanai-san) | [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23951) | [LC](https://www.livechart.me/anime/9863) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt13884016/)
Live-action dorama: [Netflix](https://www.netflix.com/title/81325501) | [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718203-kiyo-in-kyoto) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15964848/)
 
--- 
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen Manga**
description.ja: ここは京都のど真ん中にある花街。 舞妓さんたちが深夜、お仕事を終えたあと帰ってきて、共同生活を送っているのは、「屋形」と呼ばれるおうちです。 とある屋形で「まかないさん」として舞妓さんたちに毎日の食事を作っているのは、なんと弱冠16歳の少女・キヨ。 彼女がまかないさんになったのには、ある意外な理由があって——。 華やかな花街の舞台裏、普通の日のごはんを通して、温かな人間模様が描かれます。

altTitles.ja: ねこだまり

description.en: Imagine going home after a tiring shift from work… when you open the door, there lies a paradise of three fluffy house cats! This story is about a tired office lady living with her three unique cats. They interrupt her meals and when she's cleaning, and has to put up with their moody attitudes. Her everyday life is constantly at the mercy of her cats!
description.pt-br: Imagine voltar para casa depois de um turno cansativo de trabalho… ao abrir a porta, lá está um paraíso de três gatos domésticos fofinhos! Esta história é sobre uma senhora de escritório cansada que vive com seus três gatos únicos. Eles interrompem suas refeições e quando ela está limpando, e tem que aguentar suas atitudes mal-humoradas. Sua vida cotidiana está constantemente à mercê de seus gatos!

altTitles.ja: 道産子ギャルはなまらめんこい

altTitles.es: Esa gal de Hokkaido es demasiado linda

description.en: Shiki Tsubasa has just moved from Tokyo to Hokkaido in the middle of winter. Not quite appreciating how far apart towns are in the country, he gets off the taxi at the next town over from his destination so he can see the sights around his home, but he is shocked when he learns the "next town" is a 3-hour walk away. However, he also meets a cute Dosanko (born and raised in Hokkaido) gyaru named Fuyuki Minami who is braving 8 degrees celcius below 0 weather in the standard gyaru outfit of short skirts and bare legs!
description.es:
Tsubasa es un chico que se va vivir desde Tokyo a Hokkaido en pleno invierno porque han trasladado a su padre. En su antiguo instituto no era nada popular y se metían con él siempre que podían. Dispuesto a empezar una nueva vida, llega en taxi entre un paisaje nevado y se baja a las primeras de cambio pensando que ya ha llegado.

Pero pronto se da cuenta de que en Hokkaido las cosas son diferentes que en la gran ciudad y aquí las distancias son mucho mayores, así que el sitio al que iba está a tres horas andando: eso significa que se ha quedado tirado en medio de la nieve. El impacto es mayor cuando se encuentra con Minami Fuyuki, una chica vestida como la típica gal pese al frío que hace.

Minami no sólo es guapa, sino que es una chica supermaja y con las maneras de una gal, un crush instantáneo para Tsubasa, aunque el combo de gal más chica de pueblo lo deja bastante perplejo y más cuando se entera de que van al mismo instituto. Gracias a Minami podrá integrarse bastante rápido y conocer a otras gals, aunque el choque cultural a varios niveles está servido. ¡Sus días de gals, frío y diversión acaban de empezar!
description.fr:
Natsukawa Tsubasa vient de déménager de Tokyo à Hokkaido, en plein hiver. Ne se rendant pas compte de la réalité des distances à la campagne, il se retrouve perdu à 3 heures de marche de sa destination. Mais il fait également la rencontre d’une Dosanko (« née et élevée à Hokkaido ») gyaru, en minijupe par – 8°C !  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ikada_kai) | [Author's YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-U4OJu-cEF2VlnM61B77bQ) | [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/21326958)
description.ru:
Нацукава Цубаса только что переехал из Токио на Хоккайдо.  Не имея представления, о том какое большое расстояние между населёнными пунктами в захолустье он решил выйти из такси в соседнем городе, посреди зимы. Однако он был шокирован узнав, что до соседнего города идти целых 3 часа. Тут же он встречает Досанко-гяру (родом из Хоккайдо) по имени Фуюки Минами, которая при минус 8 градусах цельсия ходит в стандартной одежде гяру: короткой юбке и с голыми ногами.  


---
description.tr: Liseli Tsubasa, Hokkaido’daki Kitami şehrine taşınır ve oradaki bir otobüs durağında bir "gyaru" ile tanışır. Dondurucu soğuğa rağmen çıplak bacaklarıyla beyaz kar manzarasının karşısında tek başına durduğunu görmek kalbini cezbeder.
description.pt-br: Shiki Tsubasa acaba de se mudar de Tóquio para Hokkaido no meio do inverno. Sem perceber a distância entre as cidades do país, ele desce do táxi na cidade mais próxima de seu destino para poder ver os pontos turísticos ao redor de sua casa, mas fica chocado quando descobre que a "próxima cidade" é uma a três horas a pé. No entanto, ele também conhece uma linda Dosanko (nascido e criado em Hokkaido) gyaru chamado Fuyuki Minami, que está enfrentando um clima de 8 graus Celsius abaixo de 0 com a roupa gyaru padrão de saias curtas e pernas nuas!

altTitles.vi: Chuyên gia trêu chọc Takagi-san (ngoại truyện)

altTitles.ja: からかい上手の（元）高木さん

altTitles.tl: Ang Magaling sa Panunuksong (Noon) si Takagi-san

description.en:
Takagi and Nishikata are now married and have a kindergarten-aged daughter named Chi. See how much some things have changed, and others have curiously stayed the same!  
  
*Note: The volumes collect the chapters in a different order than the web version. The chapters here follow the web numbering without any volumes.*
description.pt-br:
Takagi e Nishikata agora estão casados e têm uma filha na idade do jardim de infância chamada Chi. Veja o quanto algumas coisas mudaram e outras curiosamente permaneceram as mesmas!

Nota: Os volumes coletam os capítulos em uma ordem diferente da versão web. Os capítulos aqui seguem a numeração da web sem nenhum volume.

altTitles.ja: 星屑テレパス

altTitles.th: โทรจิตละอองดาว

description.en: Umika is a very shy girl who has always been very bad at communicating with others. Over time she gave up on making any friends, until one day she meets the transfer student Yuu. Yuu claims to be an alien with the power of "Foreheadelepathy" - being able to read people's emotions by pressing her forehead to theirs.    From the up-and-coming author Okuma Rasuko, a dazzling story about yuri, space and youth.
description.pt-br: Umika é uma estudante muito gentil e tímida. Ela acha difícil falar com outras pessoas e sonha em um dia conhecer alguém de outro planeta. Mas sua solitária vida escolar toma um rumo cósmico quando ela conhece a nova aluna transferida chamada Yu, uma alienígena com poderes telepáticos! As duas se aproximam e prometem um dia irem ao espaço. É assim que elas decidem construir um foguete e disparar em direção às estrelas, fazendo novas amizades pelo caminho.

altTitles.ja: やしろの魔王

description.en: Maou Shaitan Geneha, a demon lord whose powers were sealed away, seeks out the descendant of the one who sealed her; company employee Shishibe Yashiro. Wanting Yashiro to undo the seal, Maou forms a contract with her, aiming to satisfy Yashiro in the hopes that she'll undo the seal.

title.ja: I Don't Know Which Is Love

altTitles.ja: どれが恋かがわからない

altTitles.id: Aku Nggak Tau Yang Mana Cinta

altTitles.ja-ro: Dore ga Koi Ka ga Wakaranai

description.en: Our protagonist, Soraike Mei, confessed her unrequited love to her friend at the high school graduation ceremony… That was the plan, at least. Her confession was a failure. Because of that, she is keen to “Definitely get a girlfriend during college!” But for some reason, one woman after another keeps on approaching her?!
description.id: Mei, seorang gadis yang pernah merasakan pahitnya cinta yang telah direbut oleh suatu cowok pada saat kelulusan SMA, mencoba berusaha untuk menggaet cewek di Universitas. Namun, dalam kehidupan di kampusnya, dia tidak hanya didekati oleh 1 cewek, tetapi 5 cewek! Apakah Mei dapat bertahan hidup karenanya?
